segments.text: Oh , uh ... Thanks . Henry , do you have a light ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks . Lovely day . Pity I ’ m on duty .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ ll stand in with you if you like . I ’ Ve got nothing else to do .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , no . I couldn ’ t possibly .
segments.speaker: S2
